=== An update from the Forums Council for June 2015 ===

==== New Ubuntu Member via forums contributions ====

We are happy to announce <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/member.php?u=27747|ajgreeny]]</nowiki> has been granted Ubuntu membership. The process is outlined in the forums thread <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1750642|here]]</nowiki> and wiki <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Forums/Membership|there]]</nowiki>.

==== Staff Team ====

Elfy has stepped down from the Forum Council and from the staff team after several years of dedicated voluntary service to the forum community.

Two forums moderators have also stepped down, Caboose885 and not found. 

Should you wish to add items to the agenda here is the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ForumCouncilAgenda|link]]</nowiki>.
